'''Temple of the Lion''' is a [[One-Time Domain]] located in [[Falcon Coast]].

==Location==
<gallery hideaddbutton="true" captionalign="center">
Domain Temple of the Lion Map.png
</gallery>

==Enemies==
The challenge is started by activating an Electro [[Elemental Monument]].

The player will have to defeat 20 Hydro and Cryo [[slimes]], including 2 Giant slimes, with not more than 15 seconds passing between each kill.

Immediately after, the player has to defeat 7 enemies, including 2 [[Abyss Mages]], one Cryo and one Hydro, and must not be frozen for more than 5 times.
